name: Game Of Evolution - Season 1
description:
One day, an unknown force arrives on Earth, causing the sudden disappearance of the energy resources that humanity depends on for survival. Faced with a severe.
You will play as a college student, embarking on a journey that starts with a simple quest for survival but leads to the uncovering of the truth.
During your journey, you will encounter girls of different ages and personalities, and engage in passionate and captivating romantic stories with them.

Features

Choices That Matter
In the game, you have the ability to influence the relationships between the girls and other male characters by making choices, either avoiding or encouraging romantic encounters.

High-Quality Renders
Experience the ultimate sensory immersion with high-definition rendering and post-processing at 1080P, delivering the best visual experience.

Special Note

We are not native English speaker, and the English translation of the game was completed with the help of translation software.
If it has caused any inconvenience or negative experience, We sincerely apologize.
We will promptly seek qualified proofreaders to improve the translations in future updates.
